1001.detail_note:
I. Core Rewards:

Whispering Waves ×1
Frosted Branch ×1
"Precise Scan Voucher ×10" ×1
"Functor Scan Voucher ×5" ×2
"Transcendence Crystal ×10" ×1
"Spirit Extract T4 ×96" ×1
"Sigil Module T3 ×40" ×1


II. Event Rules:

1. Every invitation consumes a Special VIP Invite. Shifted Stars and Shifting Flowers can be redeemed for Special VIP Invites. <color=#F6841D>When purchasing Special VIP Invites using Shifting Flowers, discounts will be applied based on the current number of purchase</color>.
2. Each invitation grants a chance of obtaining different type of rewards: <color=#F6841D>1%</color> for Core Rewards and <color=#F6841D>99%</color> for Other Rewards. Each invitation grants a reward. One Core Reward is guaranteed within every <color=#F6841D>10</color> invitations. <color=#F6841D>Once a reward is drawn, it cannot be drawn again</color>. All rewards in the pool will be drawn within <color=#F6841D>80</color> invitations.
3. When purchasing Special VIP Invites using Shifted Stars, they cost Shifted Star ×120 each. Up to 80 Invites may be purchased.
4. When purchasing Special VIP Invites using Shifting Flowers, they cost Shifting Flower ×120 each. The discounts are as follows: 20 Invites at 90% off (Shifting Flower ×12 each), 10 Invites at 80% off (Shifting Flower ×24 each), 10 Invites at 70% off (Shifting Flower ×36 each), 10 Invites at 60% off (Shifting Flower ×48 each), 10 Invites at 40% off (Shifting Flower ×72 each), 10 Invites at 20% off (Shifting Flower ×96 each), and 10 Invites at full price. Up to 80 Invites may be purchased in total.

III. Core Reward Probability:

1. When a Core Reward is drawn, the initial probability of it being each Core Reward is as follows:

Whispering Waves: 0.30%
Frosted Branch: 30.00%
Precise Scan Voucher ×10: 2.70%
Functor Scan Voucher ×5: 10.00%
Transcendence Crystal ×10: 12.00%
Spirit Extract T4 ×96: 20.00%
Sigil Module T3 ×40: 25.00%

2. When a Core Reward is drawn, the probability of it being each reward in the Core Reward Pool will be adjusted in real time based on their corresponding weights. The formula is as follows:

<color=#F6841D>Probability of drawing a specific reward = number of that reward remaining × that reward's weight ÷ sum of each reward's (number remaining in the Core Reward Pool × corresponding weight)</color>

Each reward's weight:

Whispering Waves	   3
Frosted Branch	   300
Precise Scan Voucher ×10	 27
Functor Scan Voucher ×5	  50
Transcendence Crystal ×10	  120
Spirit Extract T4 ×96	 200
Sigil Module T3 ×40	 250

For example:
If the Core Rewards Frosted Branch, Sigil Module T3 ×40, and Spirit Extract T4 ×96 have already been drawn, when another Core Reward is drawn, the chance of it being Whispering Waves is:
3 × 1 ÷ (3 × 1 + 27 × 1 + 50 × 2 + 120 × 1) = 1.20%
When only Whispering Waves and Precise Scan Voucher ×10 remain in the Core Reward Pool, if a Core Reward is drawn, the chance of it being Whispering Waves is:
3 × 1 ÷ (3 × 1 + 27 × 1) = 10.00%
As is shown, the probability of all items will vary based on what has already been drawn.

1002.detail_note:
I. Core Rewards:

Twilight Pearl ×1
"Precise Scan Voucher ×5" ×1
"Polymerized Function Crystal ×24" ×1
"Reconstructor ×20" ×1


II. Event Rules:

1. Every invitation consumes a Banquet Invite. Shifted Stars and Shifting Flowers can be redeemed for Banquet Invites. <color=#F6841D>When purchasing Banquet Invites using Shifting Flowers, discounts will be applied based on the current number of purchase</color>.
2. Each invitation grants a chance of obtaining different type of rewards: <color=#F6841D>1%</color> for Core Rewards and <color=#F6841D>99%</color> for Other Rewards. Each invitation grants a reward. One Core Reward is guaranteed within every <color=#F6841D>10</color> invitations. <color=#F6841D>Once a reward is drawn, it cannot be drawn again</color>. All rewards in the pool will be drawn within <color=#F6841D>40</color> invitations. 
3. When purchasing Banquet Invites using Shifted Stars, they cost Shifted Star ×60 each. Up to 40 Invites may be purchased.
4. When purchasing Banquet Invites using Shifting Flowers, they cost Shifting Flower ×60 each. The discounts are as follows: 10 Invites at 90% off (Shifting Flower ×6 each), 10 Invites at 60% off (Shifting Flower ×24 each), 10 Invites at 20% off (Shifting Flower ×48 each), and 10 Invites at full price. Up to 40 Invites may be purchased in total.

III. Core Reward Probability:

1. When a Core Reward is drawn, the initial probability of it being each Core Reward is as follows:

Twilight Pearl: 2.50%
Precise Scan Voucher ×5: 7.50%
Polymerized Function Crystal ×24: 40.00%
Reconstructor ×20: 50.00%

2. When a Core Reward is drawn, the probability of it being each reward in the Core Reward pool will adjust in real time based on their corresponding weights. The formula is as follows:

<color=#F6841D>Probability of claiming a specific reward = number of that reward remaining × the reward's weight ÷ (number of Core Rewards remaining in the pool × each reward's corresponding weight)</color>

Each reward's weight is as follows:

Twilight Pearl	1
Precise Scan Voucher ×5	3
Polymerized Function Crystal ×24	16
Reconstructor ×20	 20

For example:
If the Core Rewards Reconstructor ×20 and Polymerized Function Crystal ×24 have already been drawn, when another Core Reward is drawn, the chance of it being Twilight Pearl is
1 × 1 ÷ (1 × 1 + 3 × 1) = 25.00%
As is shown, the probability of all items will vary based on what has already been drawn.
